p: What are the causes of epidemics, past, present, and future? Undoubtedly, a major one is that we have chosen to live with them rather than to eliminate them [ Yang et al., 2020]. In the sections below, we shall describe some of the recent epidemics and pandemics that have disrupted, are disrupting, and will continue to disrupt our congenial lifestyles. We shall provide solutions that each of us can choose to abide by in order to dramatically reduce the consequences of many kinds of transmissible viral (and prion) diseases while improving our lives, minimizing our morbidities, and extending our lifespans.
